name: LLM Gateway
description: This feature installs LiteLLM and associated dependencies to enable LLM Gateway - supporting LLM Proxy, semantic cache, PII masking, cost and budget management, and other features.

enablePresidio.description: Flag indicating whether or not to include Presidio for PII masking

enableRedis.description: Flag indicating whether or not to include Redis for llm response caching

enableLangfuse.description: Flag indicating whether or not to include Langfuse for LLM tracing

startWithDefaults.description: Flag indicating whether or not to start the gateway components with default configurations
